trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> objects.

Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.

**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe.
For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
XAML Implicit Collection Usage
XAML Values
*oneOrMoreGeneralTransform3DObjectElements*
One or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> objects, declared using object element syntax.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection"></xref> class.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.%23ctor> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection"></xref> class, using the specified initial object.

<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7BSystem.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D%7D%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Initial object in the new collection class.
collection is `null`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection"></xref> class with the specified capacity, or the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> objects the collection is initially capable of storing.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.%23ctor%28System.Int32%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> objects that the collection is initially capable of storing.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> object to the end of the collection.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add `null`.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.Add%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> to add to the end of the collection.
value is `null`.
The collection is read-only.
\- or -
The collection has a fixed size.
Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> objects from the collection.
This method does not change the capacity of the collection.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.Clear%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The collection is read-only.
Creates a modifiable clone of this collection, making deep copies of this object's values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.Clone%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property is `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property is `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this collection object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.CloneCurrentValue%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property is `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property is `true`.
Indicates whether the collection contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> object.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.Contains%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> object to locate in the collection.
`true` if the collection contains value; otherwise, `false`.

Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> objects in the collection into an array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index position.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.CopyTo%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The destination array.
The zero-based index position where copying begins.
array is `null`.
index is less than zero.
array is multidimensional.
-or-
The number of items in the source collection is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
Gets the number of objects in this collection.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.Count%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The number of items in the collection.
Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
An enumerator that can iterate the collection.
Searches for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> object within the collection.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.IndexOf%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The object to locate.
The zero-based index position of value, or –1 if the object is not found in the collection.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> object into the specified index position within the collection.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert `null`.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.Insert%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The zero-based index position to insert the object.
The object to insert.
value is `null`.
index is not a valid index in the collection.
The collection is read-only.
\- or -
The collection has a fixed size.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> object at the specified index position.

Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a `null` reference.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.Item%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The zero-based index position of the object to get or set.
The object at the index position.
value is `null`.
index is not a valid index in the collection.
The collection is read-only.
\- or -
The collection has a fixed size.
Deletes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> object from the collection.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.Remove%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The object to remove.
`true` if value was successfully deleted; otherwise, `false`.
The collection is read-only.
\- or -
The collection has a fixed size.
Deletes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection"></xref>.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.RemoveAt%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The zero-based index position to remove the object.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.

<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.System%23Collections%23Generic%23ICollection%7BSystem%23Windows%23Media%23Media3D%23GeneralTransform3D%7D%23IsReadOnly%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.

For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection.System%23Collections%23ICollection%23CopyTo%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
A zero-based <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection"></xref>.
The first position in the specified <xref href="System.Array"></xref> to receive the copied contents.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.

An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
